product_name: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Blueberries Fruit Snack - 2 oz.
long_description: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Blueberries fruit snack gives you a delicious and easy way to enjoy this tasty fruit. No preparation necessary-just open the package and enjoy the freeze-dried blueberries. Eat them alone or add them to cereal, yogurt, sauces, salads, baked goods, smoothies or ice cream. Contents are equivalent to approximately 1 lb. of fresh blueberries. Resealable package keeps the freeze-dried blueberries crisp. Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Blueberries fruit snack has no additives, preservatives or sweeteners; naturally gluten, dairy, wheat and nut free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Blueberries fruit snack gives you a delicious and easy way to enjoy this tasty fruit.
